description: A great way to use up leftover salad leaves, this easy pesto is delicious tossed through pasta, used as a base sauce for pizza or dolloped on lamb cutlets.
name: Leftover Salad Greens Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.25 cups salad leaves (leftover such as rocket or baby spinach leaves)
0.5 bunch herb stalks (leftover such as parsley, basil and coriander)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth and combined. Season.
